title: UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, Professional Flash Non Toxic Safe Tattoo Halloween FX Party Artist Fancy Makeup Painting Kit For Kids and Adult
descriptions:

Use the included sponge or brush for effortless application.

The UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette offers unmatched quality with its creamy, intensely pigmented formula. It's quick-drying, smudge-proof, and flexible, making it ideal for a range of looks like crowns, costumes, bruises, blood, or cosplay. Its oil base ensures maximum coverage and comfort while providing easy blending and minimal rub-off.

When the party's over, removal is a breeze! Simply use olive oil or professional waterproof makeup remover to effortlessly take off your masterpiece. The UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette is gentle on the skin, ensuring you can express yourself creatively without any worries. Embrace your artistic side with this high-quality, long-lasting, and durable oil paint palette.
